introdution:
I research various aspects of language,
especially the language of social  media and I speak,
 write and teach courses and workshops about this.
belifeList: consult on forensic linguistics as an expert witness.

highlights.content: Leading the lesson "Does grammar matter"(viewed more than 2 million times).
